title: Labor Market Trends, Child Detentions Means Millions for Nonprofit, Fox Accepts Disney Offer
itunes:title: Labor Market Trends, Child Detentions Means Millions for Nonprofit, Fox Accepts Disney Offer
description:
Carol speaks to Josh Wright, Chief Economist at iCIMS, on worker training trends. Alex Wayne, Bloomberg News White House Team Leader, discusses a non-profit getting $458 million for the detention center that is housing immigrant children. Tuna Amobi,Media and Entertainment Analyst at CFRA, and Nabila Ahmed, Bloomberg News Media M&A Reporter, talk about Fox accepting Disney's $71 billion offer and the deal is close to winning U.S. antitrust approval. Craig Johnson, President of Customer Growth Partners, shares his back to school retail outlook. And we Drive to the Close with Chris Cordaro, Chief Investment Officer at RegentAtlantic.   

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
